revised_title: The Effect of Local Freezing on Mammalian Cells and Tissues
tldr: The author discusses the effects of local freezing on mammalian cells and tissues, highlighting the importance of preventing stasis development to increase the range of tolerance to local freezing and irradiation. The author also explores the effect of hypothermia on the radiosensitivity of mice to whole-body X-irradiation.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology and Tissue Engineering
